tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Return of Mimmy Blackhorse
programme.desc: An Army forensic pathologist joins forces with Harm, Mac, Bud and Harriet as they try to verify that newly unearthed human remains are those of a heroic Navajo "code-talker" who had been missing since WWII.(n)

programme.title: JAG: The Imposter
programme.desc: Harm is held captive by Palmer, a renegade government agent with whom he had crossed swords a few months ago. While Palmer prepares a life mask so he can pass for Harm, he explains his plans to assassinate the key witness in the trial.(n)

programme.title: JAG: To Russia With Love
programme.desc: With evidence that his missing father could still be alive in, Harm convinces the Admiral to give him time off so he can go to Russia. In Moscow, they are questioned by Mark Falcon, the KGB agent who had stolen a list of POW's earlier from Harm.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Gypsy Eyes
programme.desc: Unable to lose the pursuing Russian fighters, Harm's and Mac’s hijacked Mig is shot out of the sky over Siberia.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Act of Terror
programme.desc: When Arab terrorists attach a mine to a US Navy warship in an attempt to sink it, Marine guards are able to kill one and capture the other, even after the mine explodes, killing two sailors.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Grow a Deer, A Female Deer
programme.sub-title: Grow a Deer, A Female Deer
programme.desc: When poachers almost kill a pregnant endangered deer, Team Scorpion recreates the animal's womb to try to save it and its baby's life. Also, Happy and Toby discuss the future of their family.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Nuke Kids on the Block
programme.desc: While decommissioning an old nuclear missile, a simple accident causes Team Scorpion to endure exposure to toxic vapor while trying to prevent the nuke from detonating.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Sci Hard
programme.desc: While attending a tech convention, Team Scorpion is taken hostage by a group attempting a virtual heist.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Queen Scary
programme.desc: At Halloween, Team Scorpion takes on a case to prove the existence of ghosts on the Queen Mary but find an all-too-real disaster when they locate a 'ghost ship' on a deadly collision course.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Go With the Florence
programme.desc: While tracking a device that can prevent a nuclear meltdown through the Los Angeles sewers, Walter learns the nuances of listening and not offering advice to Paige.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Home Run
programme.desc: After a community-outreach baseball game erupts in a drive-by shooting, Gail’s relationship with her brother is put to the test . Meanwhile, Swarek plans a getaway with Andy up to Oliver’s cabin, which goes off the rails in every possible way.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Best Man
programme.desc: Andy and Sam are shocked to learn that Oliver is the prime suspect in IA’s corruption investigation into 15 Division. They only have until end of day today to find Chris Klem – the missing explosives-dealer – and clear Oliver’s name.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Integrity Test
programme.desc: With Oliver still the prime suspect in the bombing of 15’s evidence room, Andy, Dov, Gail, and Nick undertake a risky – and potentially career-ending – plan to prove that Commissioner Alonso Santana is corrupt.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Ninety Degrees
programme.desc: Andy heads out with a very-pregnant Marlo to find a volatile woman who’s gone missing after group therapy, but neither Andy nor Marlo are prepared when Marlo suddenly goes into labor.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Breaking Up the Band
programme.desc: Now that Sam and Marlo’s baby girl has arrived (Ep. 520), it’s clear nothing could have prepared Andy for this moment. So when Juliet offers Andy an opportunity to leave town for 4 months on an undercover project, Andy starts to consider it.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: 74 Epiphanies
programme.desc: Andy and Sam’s wedding comes just in time for the gang to celebrate one last hurrah. But when Andy is taken off-course by a hitchhiker and then stranded on the side of a dead-end road with a dying man, she finds herself with no way to get help.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bron-Y-Garth Hospital Pt1
programme.desc: Stuart ventures into Bron-Y-Garth, an old workhouse and abandoned hospital. The spirits that reside here are said to be plentiful, something Stuart finds out all to soon.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bron-Y-Garth Hospital Pt2
programme.desc: Karl takes on the formidable cell block of Bron-Y-Garth, a former workhouse and abandoned hospital. The dark corridors are said to house many an aggressive entity, and soon Karl finds out first-hand what it they capable of in a climactic end.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Champness Hall
programme.desc: Yvette, Karl & Stuart investigate the pride of Rochdale, Champness Hall. With loud footsteps and strange noises, the team seem to be followed by a persistent spirit.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Charlton House
programme.desc: Karl investigates Carlton house library for the first time and quickly realises that he is not alone.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Chillingham Castle
programme.desc: Karl & Stuart take on one of the Most Haunted rooms in this ancient castle. Whatever is there, seems desperate to make itself known.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Doncaster Air Museum Pt1
programme.desc: The famous Air Museum in Doncaster houses many an artefact of aviation history and many spirit from its past. Karl investigates one of the huts that is said to be full of paranormal happenings, and he isn’t disappointed.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Doncaster Air Museum Pt2
programme.desc: The main hanger of Doncaster Air Museum is a vast building and houses flying aircraft of every kind. Stuart ventures alone and soon realises something is there with him.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Houghton Hears A Who?
programme.desc: TAPS investigates Houghton Mansionin North Adams, Massachusetts where the repercussions of a deadly car accident could be behind unexplained phenomena on the property.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: New Hampshire Gothic
programme.desc: The TAPS team heads to New Hampshire to help a group of volunteers figure out what is causing the lively paranormal activity in their otherwise quiet museum.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Unexplained Phenomena
programme.desc: This week, TAPS takes a call from the American Legion in Pennsylvania where people are terrified by paranormals.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Time To Get Touched
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Ohio and to the Thurber house, the home of author James Thurber, whowrote The Night the Ghost Got In based off his paranormal experiences there.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Fair Unknown
programme.desc: The crew rescues one of the long-lost founders of the Commonwealth, but discovers she may be more trouble than she is worth.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Belly of the Beast
programme.desc: A mythological space monster tries to eat the Andromeda.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Knight, Death and the Devil
programme.sub-title: The Knight, Death and the Devil
programme.desc: Dylan attempts to liberate a fleet of captured ships, but the fleet isn't sure it wants to be liberated. Their AIs fear that new captains will enslave them.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Immaculate Perception
programme.desc: Genites attack Tyr's wife and colony.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.sub-title: Tunnel at the End of the Light
programme.desc: With fifty parties on board, Dylan hosts the signing of the New Commonwealth charter, but soon discovers there are intruders intent on stopping the signing.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka and Tyr are taken over by the energy from a dimensional tunnel. Dylan, Trance and Harper must save them before they destroy the ship.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.125
programme.desc: Family disputes details and payment for deceased woman's $19,000 funeral after 15-year cancer battle/Ex-boyfriend sued for unpaid credit card charges in her name; cites father's death and hardships.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.251
programme.desc: Allegations arise in a lawsuit where a woman sues her ex for a loan to break his apartment lease. A CD collection is withheld amid a dispute between former partners. A man goes into rehab for addiction, leading to his ex-roommate suing after he moved out.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.65
programme.desc: Man allegedly damages SUV during child custody exchange, claims admission under duress. Teenager sued by older sister for scooter balance; teen claims vehicle given in exchange for care of grandmother.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.24
programme.desc: Babysitter accused of falsely claiming ex-employer smoked marijuana in front of child/Gallery owner denies scamming customer, claims heirloom sapphire sold for alleged ten dollars.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.229
programme.desc: A woman denies filing a retaliatory restraining order after finding her ex-fiancé with someone else; accused of kicking his bedroom door. Another woman sued for passing fraudulent check in secret-shopper scam.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.115
programme.desc: Man accuses ex-lover of sending explicit photos/Sued for damaging ex-girlfriend's Mustang in accident.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.107
programme.desc: Woman countersues roommate's husband for sexual advances amid back rent lawsuit/Man denies requesting mother's payments on Audi A6 in lawsuit.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.188
programme.desc: A troubled teen is at the center of a dispute between a woman and her son-in-law’s daughter over the cost of two airplane tickets to Pittsburgh.\t\t\t\r\nA woman sues her son-in-law’s granddaughter for money loaned to buy a mobile home.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.66
programme.desc: A woman and her niece wage war over impound fees on a Chevy Trailblazer, the cost of college tuition, and $92 dollars allegedly ‘stolen’ by a raccoon.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.43
programme.desc: Teenager steals mother's checkbook, buys car; parents sue custom shop owner/Woman sues ex-lover for leaving her for mother of his child; he claims bitterness, she alleges owed money.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.13
programme.desc: A woman claims her ex-boyfriend asked her to pawn her jewelry to pay their bills; he says she offered to do it/A loan to pay DUI bills is disputed by ex-lovers, one of whom claims it was a birthday gift.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Teamwork plays an important role during a relay race in which duos must accomplish basic culinary tasks; while challenge winners go to San Francisco, the losing team picks carrots at a farm; both teams disappoint during dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants learn about teamwork during a challenge involving pigs and potatoes; while the winning team enjoys a day on a yacht, the losers bathe their new livestock friends; a disorganized dinner service leaves chef Ramsay disappointed.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants take part in a team competition involving 10 dishes of lobster ravioli that must be prepared perfectly. The winners earn a swim at a Beverly Hills residence.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams must pair side dishes with four different types of protein; while the losing team makes honey taffy from scratch, the winners spend a day at Laguna Beach; the teams prepare a breakfast reception for a wedding.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams must pick a team leader for the next dinner service; a chef serves an undercooked dish; a contestant is eliminated.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Contestants from each team must work in pairs and present a unique pizza dish to Ramsay; the losers clean up and prepare both kitchens for dinner service, while the winners go to a luxurious hotel; one team runs out of a crucial ingredient.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Toronto Transit Commission (TTC) City Councillor and TTC Chair Karen Stintz goes undercover inside the country's largest mass transit system to get her hands dirty with some of the toughest and grittiest jobs.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the world’s largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Optimal Male
programme.desc: Jeff's drive to be labeled an 'optimal male' on his life-insurance physical leads him to some extreme behavior, while Adam's over-friendliness with an ex-girlfriend unsettles Jennifer.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Russell's Father's Son
programme.desc: Russell puts on a show to impress his father when he comes to town, but both he and Adam learn the meaning of a parent's tough love. Meanwhile, an 'accident' in their apartment forces Adam and Jennifer to invade Audrey and Jeff's bathroom.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Buyer's Remorse
programme.desc: Jennifer and Adam attempt to practice fiscal responsibility as they consider buying their apartment. Audrey and Jeff offer to write their letter of recommendation, but end up making matters worse when they have a run-in with the landlady.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Pimp My Bride
programme.desc: Russell reluctantly agrees to host a photo shoot in his apartment for Audrey's magazine, with the hope of landing a date with a hot model. Adam steps in to play the groom in Audrey's wedding-themed shoot.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff’s New Friend
programme.desc: Jeff is surprised when Audrey informs him that the new friend he made at the gym is gay. Meanwhile, Russell worries the young woman he's dating might be his daughter.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Voluntary Commitment
programme.desc: After a long line of female assistants, Russell learns that having a male assistant can be very advantageous. Meanwhile, after volunteering to read to the elderly, Audrey makes a bet with Jeff that she can commit to finishing a project.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Dad's Visit
programme.desc: Much to Audrey's dismay, Jeff's chauvinist father, who expects Audrey to wait on him hand and foot, extends his visit after spraining his ankle. Meanwhile, Russell has a one-night stand with a woman who won't leave his apartment.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Russell's Secret
programme.desc: Audrey discovers that Russell is a closeted fan of Broadway musicals, a fact she promises to keep secret in exchange for free theater tickets. Meanwhile, Adam and Jennifer take dancing lessons in preparation for their wedding.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Twice
programme.desc: When Audrey becomes jealous of a pregnant co-worker, she inadvertently convinces her colleagues that she has a bundle of joy on the way too.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Lyin' King
programme.desc: Things quickly get complicated when Audrey and Jeff decide to ditch a dinner date with Jennifer and Adam in order to attend Brad and Jackie's exclusive, celebrity packed party.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Family Style
programme.desc: When Audrey plans a dinner date with Jeff, Jackie (Guest Star Sam Harris) and Brad (Guest Star Orlando Jones), Jeff feels extremely violated when Jackie begins eating off his plate!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prayers and Mace
programme.desc: Both brother Tim and fellow Honolulu bondsman James need Dog's help to track down their hard to find fugitives. The two cases on the docket today are challenging, especially the hunt for Gregory, a felon with a lengthy rap sheet.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Love and to Cherish
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are off to the Big Island for their wedding. They hope to relax for a few days but it turns out Leland has a fugitive he needs to catch and despite the time limit, neither Dog nor Beth can resist the opportunity to catch a fugitive.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Lost in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog lectures high school students about the dangers of drugs before going after Joseph, a dangerous fugitive who won't be easy to capture.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cutting the Apron Strings
programme.desc: Two different young men both have a bad habit of missing their court dates. Looking over their files Dog senses that they have another trait in common, both are a little too tied to their mothers.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Dog believes in safety first, and today's hunt puts this philosophy to the test. The fugitive's problem with anger management increases the dangers of their already risky line of work. Dog warns the crew to be ready for anything as they head out.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fly Boy
programme.desc: Dog told him not to go, but Charles went anyway, skipping to Oregon against the terms of his bail. Now Dog has a tip that Charles plans to slip back into Honolulu. With $30,000 on the line Dog knows he can leave little to chance.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bounty Baby
programme.desc: What's a father to do? When the cops ask Dog for help tracking down a renegade teen with a history of running hard, Baby Lyssa, eight months pregnant and counting, insists on joining the hunt. Can Dog keep his daughter safe and catch his man?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Picture This
programme.desc: A fugitive with a long criminal record has fled to Hawaii, and the bondsman on the mainland has asked Dog for help. Dog doesn't have much information to work with, but he can use the felon's desire to impress his friends to track him down.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.sub-title: O Little Town of West Monroe
programme.desc: The Robertsons perform a live nativity for their Church for Christmas, so the wives organize rehearsals to ensure that they pull off a great event. However, rehearsals get off to a bumpy start as the guys can't stop sharing their opinions.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Boomerang Becca
programme.desc: When Rebecca returns home from her internship in Los Angeles, the Robertson family plans a big surprise party to welcome her back. Meanwhile, when Uncle Si gets sick, he seeks the help of Ms. Kay to take care of him.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie's Number Two
programme.desc: When Willie is looking to hire a new assistant, Korie insists he interviews her cousin, JD. Meanwhile, when Uncle Si spends the day over at Phil and Kay's, Jep stops by with the kids to keep them away from Jessica, who has taken ill.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Life of Si
programme.desc: After seeing footage Jep shot using a GoPro, Si decides he wants to use the camera to record a day in his life. But when Si gets on the guys nerves while they're hunting, they kick him and his GoPros out of the blind.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: From Duck 'til Dawn
programme.desc: When the duck guys have to pull an all-nighter to finish some work, Willie decides he wants to join them. But when a dying smoke detector distracts them from their work, Jase and Willie head off to disarm it.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Burger Commander
programme.desc: After visiting a popular burger restaurant, Willie and Jase get into a debate over which of them cooks the best burger, prompting them to challenge one another to a cooking contest.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: G.I. Si
programme.desc: When Willie and Jase argue over an old G.I. Joe toy, it leads them into a debate over who would make a better soldier. To settle the score, Willie and Jase head out to the woods with their friends and children for a paintball match.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jase and the Argonauts
programme.desc: When Willie gets a soft serve machine for himself, he tells the guys they can't use it until they're done working. But when Jase thinks this is unfair, he takes matters into his own hands and finds a better object to use as motivation.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fowl Playhouse
programme.desc: When Jase finds out Jep is planning to buy his kids a fancy playhouse from a catalogue, he and the guys decide to build one for Jep themselves. But the playhouse ends up looking more like a military-style duck blind.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Big LeCOWski
programme.desc: When Sadie spends the day at Duck Commander for a school project, the guys try to show her the ins-and-outs of how a successful company works. But when Willie questions Jase's ingenuity in creating new products they get into a debate.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Robertson family pulls together a family reunion to give Mia a big send-off before her surgery.(n)

programme.title: Avengers Grimm: Time Wars
programme.desc: An Evil Queen enlists Rumpelstiltskin to help her send the Avengers Grimm back in time. The Avengers will need to work together if they are to return to the present and thwart the Queen before she can carry out her evil plan.(n)

programme.title: Arthur and Merlin (2015)
programme.desc: Inspired by the same Celtic myths that J.R.R. Tolkien (author of The Lord of the Rings trilogy) read as a young man, Arthur & Merlin is an epic fantasy-adventure of good against evil.(n)

programme.title: Meteor Apocalypse
programme.desc: In this End Times thriller, a gigantic meteor enters Earth's orbit and begins to disintegrate, showering the planet in poisonous debris.(n)

programme.title: George And The Dragon
programme.desc: A knight (James Purefoy, "Rome") returning from the Crusades takes on a dragon after the disappearance of the kindly Princess Lunna (Piper Perabo, "Coyote Ugly"). With Patrick Swayze.(n)

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum. Starring: Morgan Freeman, Christopher Walken, Joseph McKenna, Wynn Everett.(n)

programme.title: Foster
programme.desc: A heart-warming story of family and friendship starring Academy Award Nominee Toni Collette and Ioan Gruffudd.(n)

programme.title: Valhalla: Legend of Thor
programme.desc: When Thor and Loki seek refuge in the home of mortals, the youngest son fails to heed a warning from the gods.(n)

programme.title: Jack Hunter: And The Star of Heaven
programme.desc: Jack Hunter realizes the pharaoh's tomb being empty except for a Roman coin means the treasure was looted to Rome but later probably transferred the the new, Byzantine capital, Constantinople.(n)

programme.title: Dragon Warriors
programme.desc: An evil wizard, Lord Tensley, seeks the hand and heart of the beautiful princess. When she refuses, he locks her away and releases a deadly dragon to terrorize the land. Starring: James Marsters, Kaitlin Doubleday, Luke Perry.(n)

programme.title: Christmas In The City
programme.desc: After closing down her family business, Wendy and her daughter move to the city for a job in the toy department. Her excitement is short lived when the store's consultant ruins the holiday spirit by replacing Santa with a male underwear model.(n)

programme.title: Santa Fake
programme.desc: A young man from Ireland has moved to the United States and finds himself working for a mob boss. When asked to deliver two mysterious briefcases, he ends up in Santa Fe working as a shopping mall Santa and on the run from the police and the mobsters.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Gift
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story. Ten-year-old Wesley puts together a "Secret Santa" gift for a needy child and when ten-year-old Megan opens the package, she discovers an item that will have a huge impact on her life to come.(n)

programme.title: This is Our Christmas
programme.desc: When a spoiled Beverly Hills teenager needs to be taught a lesson she is sent to the local ski-town, by her guardian angel mother to help save her aunt's failing bakery and learn the importance of helping others.(n)

programme.title: Evil Doctor
programme.desc: Expectant parents Aubrey and Matt find their lives haunted, and their marriage tested, by an unhinged OB GYN with a mysterious past and who is after their child.(n)

programme.title: Her Son’s Secret
programme.desc: Sarah has never given up. Having lost her son Matt 13 years ago – presumed drowned and the body never recovered -- she still keeps her hopes up. One day, Matt shows up at Sarah’s door.(n)

programme.title: My Son Is Innocent
programme.desc: After a brutal nighttime rape, police investigators zero in on teenager Eric Sutter. When the victim identifies Eric as her attacker, the legal system closes in on the boy as friends, neighbors and the media turn against him.(n)

programme.title: Bridge to Terabithia
programme.desc: A boy (Josh Hutcherson) and his new friend (AnnaSophia Robb), the class outsider, create an imaginary world in which they rule as king and queen.(n)

programme.title: Prince Valiant
programme.desc: A heroic squire (Stephen Moyer) protects a princess (Katherine Heigl) and tries to retrieve the sword Excalibur from Viking raiders.(n)

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: On Luce Price's first day at the Sword & Cross boarding school, her attention is captured by the strangely familiar Daniel Grigori. She soon discovers he is a fallen angel who has battled over her for centuries.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: With Honesty and Integrity
programme.desc: A Native acquitted of murder under Sioux law must contend with the white man's 'lynch law' justice.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Coffin for a Coward
programme.desc: A Civil War veteran tries to rid his hometown of terrorists.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Shadow of Violence
programme.desc: Suspicious townspeople are drawn toward two brothers who spend their nights digging at a grave.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas tries to dissuade a latter-day knight from rushing into battle.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Abe Lincoln's claim that he's the Great Emancipator amuses everyone except Matt Yordy.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Stubborn Grandpa Fogarty is Lucas's main roadblock as he tries to get young Woody Fogarty to attend school.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark Twain visits North Fork and quickly alienates the townspeople.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas tries to stop embittered John Holliver from venting his wrath on the people who expelled him from town years before.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas becomes the target of a vengeful mountaineer after he is responsible for a young mountain boy's death.(n)

programme.title: Grace and Goliath
programme.desc: Hollywood big-shot Josh Jenkins sweeps into Belfast to make a movie, but before long his world crashes and he loses everything. Hotel cleaner Lily invites him to stay with her family and gradually the people of this 'strange' city touch his heart forever.(n)

programme.title: The Mighty Macs
programme.desc: In the early 70s, Cathy Rush becomes the head basketball coach at a tiny, all-girls Catholic college. Though her team has no gym and no uniforms Coach Rush looks to steer her girls to their first national championship.(n)

programme.title: Ice Girls
programme.desc: A 15-year-old figure skating champion leaves the sport after her mother loses her job and the family moves to a small town. She struggles to fit in until the owner of a local skating arena helps her fulfill her true potential.(n)

programme.title: Major Movie Star
programme.desc: When a movie star suddenly finds herself broke and humiliated in the public eye, she witlessly enlists in the U.S. Army hoping in vain that it will change her life. Starring: Jessica Simpson, Vivica A. Fox, Steve Guttenberg.(n)

programme.title: Bottle Shock
programme.desc: The story of the early days of California wine making featuring the now infamous, blind Paris wine tasting of 1976 that has come to be known as "Judgment of Paris". Feat: Chris Pine, Alan Rickman & Bill Pullman.(n)

programme.title: My Bakery in Brooklyn
programme.desc: Two cousins, two kinds of thinking, and a bakery for saving.(n)

programme.title: Danger Within
programme.desc: British soldiers search for the spy in their midst as they plan a daring escape from a World War II POW camp.(n)

programme.title: Forgotten Men: The War as It Was
programme.desc: Educating the youth of 1934 about the brutal reality of warfare using contemporary film and interviews with veterans.(n)

programme.title: Landfall
programme.desc: At Coastal Command in Southern England, an RAF pilot is suspended after possibly sinking a British sub.(n)

programme.title: The Secret Place
programme.desc: A beautiful redhead becomes involved with a small-time gang of hoodlums who plan and perform a daring diamond robbery.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) experiences racism firsthand when he leaps into the body of an elderly black man in the pre-civil rights South of 1955. Guest star: Susan French. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the life of a teen-age hot-rodder who must stop his sister from marrying a wealthy bully. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a small-time detective in 1953 who is suspected of murdering his partner. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) jumps into the life of a ``ghostbuster'' who has been asked to silence the other-world murmurings of a dead romance novelist. Deborah Pratt guest stars. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) assumes the identity of a newlywed New York policeman who is pursued by his bride's jealous ex-husband. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: The Prisoner (REDUX)
programme.desc: Travis and Callie pick up a psychiatric patient with amnesia, who grows to remember Travis and wants him dead. In parallel, the new Orchard leader Tristan Catchpole set his sights on Travis, who may have some of his Cluster genes activated.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Kate (REDUX)
programme.desc: After the Trans-Utopian collides with a mine, Percy, unhappy with Caravaggio's recent crisis performance, creates a female Al program with more intuition, but it quickly develops too much independence... and an attraction to Travis.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Rivals (REDUX)
programme.desc: Callie's irritation with the Trans-Utopian's ongoing technical problems is aggravated when the sleek bounty hunting ship Seattle and its debonair captain rescue the crew from a problem. They owe him, but the whole situation doesn't feel right.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Heir and the Spare (REDUX)
programme.desc: The crew arrest a con-man preying on older women. But the prisoner has a dark secret and a genetic link to Marcus. Meanwhile, Percy's secret parallel search for Dante begins to wear on her; we fear for the consequences to her health and judgement.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: M.I.A.
programme.desc: Sydney gets kidnapped, but by whom? Nigel, Claudia and Cate will have to go through the list of enemies Sydney has made in the past and deduce which of them is responsible. Cue flashbacks.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: High Flying Ton
programme.desc: A nerdy auction buyer tests Ton and Allen's patience at a big container auction in Ventura. The guys discover a basket and burners for a hot air balloon and a 19th century German single shot rifle!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Money Makin' Monster Machines
programme.desc: The Auction Hunters team goes on the attack & ends up on a collision course with a hardened veteran auction buyer. They uncover a collection of speedy off-road vehicles and some hardcore heavy metal from the turn-of the-century!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fake Punt Payoff
programme.desc: Ton and Allen contend with a large crowd of inexperienced auction-buyers at a huge storage container auction in Pasadena. They find a small fleet of Segway personal transporters and an enormous custom-made shotgun.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Got a Gun
programme.desc: In the affluent area of Mission Hills, CA, Allen and Ton pick up an estate unit that contains a minibike, a Depression-era slot machine and an 1871 Colt revolver.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ice, Ice, Baby
programme.desc: Ton and Allen have to get aggressive when they encounter a towering opponent with a mountain of cash. The guys uncover a vintage ice resurfacing machine and an Olympic biathlon rifle!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Big Score
programme.desc: At a climate-controlled storage facility in downtown L.A., Allen and Ton's locker wins score them an antique cash register and a German H&K pistol prized by collectors.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sin City Shootout
programme.desc: 1953 Chevy-inspired bumper car; scores of M16 30-round magazines; reproduction 1940s boardwalk photobooth; aerosol-powered spud gun potato launchers.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Wild West
programme.desc: Allen and Ton explain their strategies at a storage auction in San Bernardino, win two units, then have a Pepperbox gun and vintage Lionel train set appraised by experts.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Mr. Haff Goes to Washington
programme.desc: Ton and Allen invade the Nation's capital, but meet strong resistance from local bidders. The guys uncover a Civil War era black powder revolver and a stash of South African gold coins!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Disco and Dice
programme.desc: 1978 Williams Disco pinball machine; 1898 dice popper gambling device; talking 1990s bar top breathalyzer; deadly fishing harpoon.(n)
